Title: WPF Hole Patterns
Description: A simple WPF / C# project to create geometric hole patterns on a Canvas.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A simple WPF / C# project to create geometric hole patterns on a Canvas.

My first WPF/C# code ever....The UI is written WPF XAML, and the support classes and logic is in C#

Thanks to John Fenton and Viv Phillips over on UniversalThread for helping me learn so much about how to work in C# and WPF.

(This project has been moved to GitHub: https://github.com/mattslay/WPF-Hole-Patterns )
